text: Arkaulovo () is a rural locality (a selo) and the administrative center of Arkaulovsky Selsoviet, Salavatsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 1,439 as of 2010. There are 17 streets. == Geography == It is located 25 km from Maloyaz. == References == Category:Rural localities in Salavatsky District
title: Arkaulovo
